DOC.brief_summary: This is an evaluation of the functionality and added value of cork splint materials instead of a plaster splint for children (3-11 years old).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Cork Splint Materials Instead of Plaster Splint for Children
DOC.criteria: Fractures of the wrist, forearm, elbow, ankle, foot Distortions of the wrist, elbow, ankle Wounds without tendon injuries
DOC.keyword: Fractures of the wrist, forearm, elbow, ankle, foot
Distortions of the wrist, elbow, ankle
